posts.post_content:
It has been a while since I have worked on this set, like have only added a couple this year.  I am looking for these cards graded either in PSA or SGC holders, preferably VG condition or better, but the right raw card might just trip my fancy too. Here is a short list of a few holes that I have left:

George Brown (Chicago)         SC 150 / fact. 30
Johnny Kling                          SC 150 / fact. 25
Johnny Kling                          SC 350 / fact. 25
Orval Overall (Portrait)            SC 350 / fact. 25
Orval Overall (Portrait)            SC 350 / fact. 30

PM me anything that you might have available.

Thanks,
Steve
